name: Battlestation
description:
Alone or with friends, Battlestation is a chaotic experience where you fight to protect your Space Station. You must defeat the enemy ships in time or they will pile up and destroy you. Unpack your space suit, refill your air tank and prepare yourself, they will come for you.

FRIENDS


Better with friends, up to 3 players.

MAKE THE RIGHT DECISION


To defeat your enemies, you and your friends must work as a team to craft ammo, load the cannon and shoot at the enemies. Pay attention to the enemy ships, their colours indicate the type of ammunition they are weak against.



WHO PUT THESE HERE


You have 20 Space stations to defend, but for some reason someone filled some of them with Deadly Laser Beams and Acid Pits.
